{{Infobox battle item |name = Poison Barb |image = [[File:Poison Barb.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Poison Barb''. |location =
*[[Poison Barb#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Poison Barb''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Poison_Type_icon.png|30px]] Poison type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Slowpoke Well|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Team Galactic HQ|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Po Town|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
